text: The 2013–14 UEFA Champions League group stage happened from 17th September to 11th December 2013. There were 32 teams playing in this stage. == Teams == Here are the 32 teams that made it to the group stage, grouped by their rankings based on their past performance in UEFA competitions. This includes 22 teams that started at this stage and 10 teams that won in the play-off round (5 in the Champions Route and 5 in the League Route). Key to colours in group tables Group winners and runners-up advanced to the round of 16 Third- placed teams entered the Europa League round of 32 {| class="wikitable" Team Bayern Munich 146.922 Barcelona 157.605 Chelsea 137.592 Real Madrid 136.605 Manchester United 130.592 Arsenal 113.592 Porto 104.833 Benfica 102.833 ; Notes == Groups == === Group A === \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- === Group B === \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- The match was abandoned after 31 minutes due to heavy snow, and was resumed on 11 December 2013, 14:00, from the point of abandonment. === Group C === ; Tiebreakers * Olympiacos are ranked ahead of Benfica on head-to-head points. \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- === Group D === ; Tiebreakers * Bayern Munich are ranked ahead of Manchester City on head-to-head goal difference. * Viktoria Plzeň are ranked ahead of CSKA Moscow on head-to-head away goals. \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ; Notes === Group E === \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- === Group F === ; Tiebreakers * Borussia Dortmund, Arsenal, and Napoli are ranked on head-to-head goal difference. \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- === Group G === ; Tiebreakers * Porto are ranked ahead of Austria Wien on head-to-head points. \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ; Notes === Group H === \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- == Notes == == References == Category:2013 in association football Category:2014 in association football Category:UEFA Champions League group stages Category:September 2013 events Category:October 2013 events Category:November 2013 events Category:December 2013 events
title: 2013–14 UEFA Champions League group stage
